title: Drawing, "Drawing. Botanical studies, Jamaica, West Indies", June 1865
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at left: Cardamon / leaves rich deep green edges often tipped / with orange brown.  Many dead twisted leaves wh... [white ?] and dead stalks are a luminous straw brown / Jamaica June//65 J;again, at right:  Arrow Root / Edges of leaves red maroon blending into / the green of the leaf, stems red - ribs on the / upper side sharp lines of dark maroon red; and, at right: Leaf reflects sky in a positive manner / Jamaica June //65
description: Horizontal view of a plant with many leaves and a bunch of blossoms at left, and a leaf plant and a detail at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing. Botanical studies, Jamaica, West Indies", June 1865.
June 1865. Graphite on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-8.
